description.en: Powered by Polkadot, Polkatrail elevates the travel experience industry by offering a decentralized app that lets anyone lists accommodation, tours and other city travel experiences with no middleman or tech company capturing the value on the expense of owners and customers. DEFI features like staking, reputation, loaning and fractionalized ownership transforms the in-city travel industry in the post-COVID world. Our NFT component serves as new innnovative layer that makes the experience of visiting a new place more memorable, delightful and lucrative.
